name: Red Cap Infinite Runner
description:
This game is a class assignment that was built on the MoreMountains infinite runner engine. 

The assets were created collaboratively by Ripley Heator, Delaney Rhodes, and Jay Sydorko.  This game is considered a prototype and still has some tweaking to do, so we would love to hear what you think! 

Thank you for checking out Red Cap!

Credits: 

Engine:https://infinite-runner-engine.moremountains.com/
